txt.en: 'There is a small beach alongside the camp to the south the corsairs have been using. They pull up their boats on it and bring supplies ashore, then row back out to the larger ships. This is an opportunity for us.\n\n'Plant some traps along the beach. These will damage the bottoms of the boats and make them take on water when they are put back to the waves. They will either sink on the way, or take several precious days and supplies to be repaired.'
Traps need to be placed along the beach near Hashadîr. These will damage any small boats they bring ashore.
'Corsairs live and die by the sea and by their boats. Now that they are trapped on the shore, they shall be easy pickings for us.'
The beach is at Hashadîr, to the south of Dol Amroth.\n\nTolían asked you to place several traps along the beach to damage the corsair boats.
Tolrían can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían will be pleased to the beach has been trapped.
